Title: The Facebook Scandal: What Can We Learn as Educators (e327)
Description:
Professor Britt Wattwood has moved his college classes off Facebook. Today he reflects on the implications for educators and how he’s talking about the Cambridge Analytica scandal with other educators.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e327
